# Chapter 1 - The Beginning

[[Character Alpha]] stood at the edge of the village, looking out at the road ahead.

## Scene Content

This is the opening scene of our test story. It establishes the setting and introduces our main character.

The morning sun cast long shadows across the dusty path leading away from [[Starting Village]].

"Today's the day," Alpha muttered to himself.
